page.title: 05CUSTOMS
page.content: (PANCAKE RACES) Every year on Shrove Tuesday the day before the start of Lent.All the women and girls in Collingtree line up for a pancake race.They race 60 metres tossing pancakes as they go.The winner recives sweets. (MAYPOLE DANCING) Maypole dancing in Milton usually is on the first Monday in May.The children dress up and go to the Maypole,which has coloured ribbons hanging down.The children get the ribbons and start weaving in and out of each other until they run out of ribbon.When they run out of ribbon there is a criss cross patten left down the Maypole. (BONFIRE NIGHT) In Milton at the Greyhound public house,they have a bonfire every 5th November.
